item.title: DOOM: The Dark Ages Collector’s Bundle Comes With DOOM Slayer Statue
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/doom-the-dark-ages-collectors-bundle-comes-with-doom-slayer-statue/

With its May 15 release date confirmed, Bethesda and ID Software have announced the DOOM: The Dark Ages Collector’s Bundle for players. Retailing for $199.99, the collector’s bundle comes with a number of extras for fans of the 31-year-old franchise.

In addition to the Premium Edition of the game that includes post-launch campaign DLC, the Collector’s Bundle comes with a 12″ DOOM Slayer statue with detachable weapons and cape, a metal red key card replica, a SteelBook case, a digital artbook and soundtrack, and the Divinity Skin Pack that features skins for the DOOM Slayer, Dragon, and Atlan. Lastly, players who pre-order the Premium Edition or get the Collector’s Bundle will get two days of early access to the game.

DOOM: The Dark Ages is a prequel to 2016’s DOOM, and the third game in the modern DOOM trilogy. In addition to the new Medieval setting of the game that shows the origin of DOOM Slayer, the game features a new 30-story mech called an Atlan as well as a cybernetic, fire-breathing Dragon.

“Bound to serve as the super weapon of gods and kings, the DOOM Slayer fends off demon hordes as their leader seeks to destroy the Slayer and become the only one that is feared,” the game’s description reads. “Witness the creation of a legend as the Slayer takes on all of Hell and turns the tide of the war.”

If you’re interested in the Collector’s Bundle, you can pre-order it now via Bethesda’s website.

Are you going to pick up the DOOM: The Dark Ages Collector’s Bundle? Let us know down below, and join more discussions in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the release date and story trailer for South of Midnight and find out what classic franchise just had a new game announced.  And don’t forget to sign up for our newsletter.

item.title: Intel Is Giving Away Civilization 7 And Assassin’s Creed Shadows With CPU Purchase
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/intel-is-giving-away-civilization-7-and-assassins-creed-shadows-with-cpu-purchase/

If you have been looking at upgrading your CPU in your gaming PC, there’s a new offer that may entice you to make the purchase. Intel has announced that those who purchase select CPUs will get both Civilization 7 and Assassin’s Creed Shadows completely free.

Until March 31, those who buy either an Intel Core Ultra series 2 or Intel Core 14th-gen processor will qualify for PC versions of the games.

The full list of qualifying processors are:

  • Intel® Core™ i5-14600K
  • Intel® Core™ i5-14600KF
  • Intel® Core™ i7-14700K
  • Intel® Core™ i7-14700KF
  • Intel® Core™ i9-14900K
  • Intel® Core™ i9-14900KF
  • Intel® Core™ i9-14900KS
  • Intel® Core™ Ultra 5 processor 245K
  • Intel® Core™ Ultra 5 processor 245KF
  • Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 processor 265K
  • Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 processor 265KF
  • Intel® Core™ Ultra 9 processor 285K

Once you purchase your CPU, you have until May 15th to redeem the games. To do so, you’ll have to create an account on Intel’s specific website, and follow the instructions it gives you at that time.

For those who also have Intel’s new Battlemage graphics card, both Assassin’s Creed Shadows and Civilization 7 will include support for Intel’s XeSS 2 technology. That includes support for its new XeSS Super Resolution that works to upscale graphics within your game.

Are you going to buy a new Intel CPU to get Assassin’s Creed Shadows and Civilization 7 for free? Let us know down below, and join the discussion in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the final year-end video game hardware sales data for 2024. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
